title: My Prince
body:
Carolina Pearson receives the offer of a lifetime to become the key royal photographer for the Crowned Prince Alfred, next in line for the British throne. What she doesn’t expect is to fall for the heir’s spare, Prince Harry.

Chapter Fourteen

I was watching her while she slept. I saw her chest rise and fall. The monitors at her side beeped with each pump of her heart. I kept thinking that, at any moment, those short, successive beeps could…

Read more…

blog.name: twoangelsinthediningtable
blog.title: Awkward
blog.description: Hey, I make Harry Styles imagines. And I hope you like it                             Weird/Awkward/Writing some weird stuff/Sweetstuff/Empath                           Wattpad:saichicmaynd (@BellaLikeHS2184)

title: Concert
body:
So I’m meeting Harry Styles for that first time. I’m so excited, and I’ll be more excited if I didn’t feel like shit, waking up. When I woke up, my head’s pounding,nose is a little bit droopy, and my throat hurts. And I really wanted to meet Harry and this is my chance. I’m not letting that slipped. So I just go with it and took some medicine.

I go to the shower and of course, showered, what else am I going to do there. After like 30 minutes later, I go to my bedroom and wear a white T-shirt, that is a little big for me, a flannel that’s tied to my waist, but I’m gonna wear it, don’t worry. And skinny jeans, and black vans. I know my fashion sense is weird but I don’t really care.

My best friend, Y/BF/N, texted me saying that she’s in front of my house waiting for me. She has a car, so we decided that we go together since she’s going to his concert too.

“Are you excited??!!” She asked when she saw me, getting out of my house. When I got in front of her, I was giving my ‘Really??? You’re going to ask when you literally know the answer’s’ look. And she knows that look. I get really moody when I’m sick but that’s not an excuse for me to do that. But I can’t help it.

“Of course, I’m excited. I got to see my husband” I exclaimed. I’m a hazza since One Direction made. She’s a nialler but she really like the type of music Harry’s making. A indie,rock,19’s,David Bowie type of music. But don’t get me wrong, we love Niall’s type of music too, that makes you dirty dancing.We got to the car and drive to our destination.

* An hour and few minutes leyter…

We are now in the concert’s place and we are shocked when get there. There’s no people waiting in long line,maybe we got here a little early. 

“Hey, I’m just gonna buy some things in the store. Save some spot for me, please??” She smiled at me and said 

“Of course, but are you okay?? You look paler than you actually used too” worrily. I just nodded and gave her a reassuring smile, not trusting my voice because my throat really hurts like hell. She smiled back at me, believing that I was okay. I actually can go with that. 

“But please make it faster. I don’t like talking to other people by myself” I smiled at her and nodded and walk towards the pharmacy.

So there’s no really much people here. So I bought the same pills that I had back at home and look at the description.

*But wait for another four hours before you took another pill again. If the symptoms persist, please consult your doctor…..

Shit. My head really hurts like shit. And I’m gonna wait for four hours. Fuck no. But I just go with it since there’s nothing really I can do about it and grab a large water bottle. I go to the counter and the workers there did their job.

So when I get outside, there’s a really long line. And I see the person who’s gonna check out ticket and I ran there as fast as I can.

Luckily, I caught up and we’re the first ones who got inside. 

“Y/BF/N, you go there to our assigned seats, I’m gonna follow later” I’m getting really dizzy and I also need to pee because I really drink so many water before we go here. 

“Hey, you alright?? I don’t want to be annoying, but you really look like shit” she asked me worrily. “I’m fine, now go. Meet you later” I didn’t wait for her respond and find the restroom

So I quickly found the restroom, not looking at the signs, I go inside, and didn’t even noticed the toilet bolted on the walls and other differences of a male’s bathroom and female’s bathroom. I got to the stalls and pee, after I got out, I got really dizzy, and before I knew it, I was puking my guts out.

I flushed the toilet (don’t worry, I flushed the toilet after I peed), and get out and checked myself in the mirror. I grab my water and and drank it, not really swallowing it. I spit it so I can’t taste the vomit in my mouth. When I put my head up, I’m starting to realize that this is actually not the female’s restroom. I quickly put my stuff on the bag, wanting to get out of this place before I get seen by someone. But I’m very unlucky on this day.

I bumped into someone, not wanting to look at the face. But I need to, and start to apologizing. But when my head jerked up, It wasn’t any man, but the one and only, HARRY STYLES IS IN FRONT OF ME!!!. I cannot get more dizzy when I hit my head into this man’s chest, but just any man’s, it was Harry’s. My eyes got widened, really wanting to apologize but I can’t because my throat hurts and the only thing I really wanted to do, is run. So I ran out of the bathroom, before he memorized my face and reported it to the guards.

I breathe heavily as I get into front rows, realizing that this is gonna be awkward since Harry is going to be literally in front of me, performing. This couldn’t get any worse.

So longer than a few minutes later, the concert started and Harry jump into the scene and start performing. Luckily, he didn’t see me there in front of him, he was on the other side. I’m thinking he’s looking for someone, here in the concert…

* Couple hours leyter

It’s only just two hours after I took the pills, realizing that the pill didn’t work, but I also didn’t really want to drink the pills, not wanting to know what the side effects are ( ;) ). I just drank a plenty of water. After I did that, I’m shocked when I saw that Harry’s looking at me, smiling. Like I said, I’m really moody when I’m sick so I can’t smile, I don’t want to force it. So I just stand there, quietly, not doing anything, but enjoying the music that was getting performed.

A few minutes later, they’re still performing, don’t worry, they get a break before they started to perform. And while in the middle of performing, I saw Harry mocking me, standing like me while singing, of course. And looking at me, probably, when I don’t feel like shit, I just a laugh and get embarrassed. But my head’s really pounding, adding the vibration of the speakers. My eye rolled at the back of my head and before I knew it. I blacked out.

Harry’s POV

So I saw the girl from the bathroom and decided to mock her a little. I was getting a little annoyed ( just to be clear though, Harry’s not like this. I just did this for a little bit of….I don’t know. Just deal with it) because she just stands there, just being quiet. So when she saw me, I copied the same way she was standing and look at her, but I keep singing, don’t worry. But when I saw her eyes rolled back, I kinda felt regret and sad because I thought she was mad at me. But when she fell and luckily, her best friend was fast, yes, I can tell they were best friend, caught her.

I suddenly go to the guard and told them to get the girl who just faint brought it to room where I get ready call the emergency nurse. We came prepared always at this kind of case, but the only difference is I want to meet her and apologize so she’s going to be on my room. I get back from performing, the audience was kind of confused at first, but when I get back from performing, they just continue to sing with me.

So after the performance, I call that a break. So I quickly go to the room and see her, lying on the couch, with the nurse beside her, putting a wet, cold yiwer on her forehead. The nurse were completely aware I was there and turn around. 

“So, she’s okay now, she just got a high fever, so she need to take this pills every four hours. And drink plenty of water.”. I thanked the nurse and get out of here.

I go beside the girl, and I’m gonna be honest, she’s kinda.. pretty. Evey girl is pretty in their own ways, but I just can’t help but get captured by her looks. Not completely aware, she’s now waking up.

Y/N POV

Where am I?? Why am I on the couch?. I just feel that I’m lying on the couch but I can still feel the vibrations of the sound and the music was playing. I opened my eyes and the first thing I saw, is a silhouette of a man looking at me. At first I didn’t see it, but when my eyes adjusted from the light, I saw Harry’s face staring at me. My face heat up, still embarrassed from the incident. I look from him and just stare in front of me. Still, my eyes widening, I remembered that I’m with Y/BF/N so I quickly get up and said 

“I’m fine now, I can go. My best friend’s waiting for me, thanks for the help. By-” I quickly feel a hand grab my wrist and drag me back to the couch with him. He sat and put my between his arm. My face was close to his so I stared infront of me, again. 

“Don’t worry, your best friend will go here, she’s allowed to. You rest before she got here, ‘kay?” I just nodded, enjoying that I’m between in his arms but not showing it. 

“I’m sorry when I mocked you, I don’t know how are you feeling then” he apologized. 

“No, it’s okay. Don’t apologize, I should be the one who should be apologizing now. I’m sorry for the “bathroom” incident a while a ago. I didn’t really realized that I was on male’s bathroom” I apologized back. 

“It’s okay,babe. Maybe we should just start over again, what’s your name?” He turn to me, making me turn to him too and said 

“Y/N”. 

“What a unique name” he complemented. My face heat up, I can’t register what’s going on. I heard a running footsteps towards the room and the door quickly opened. Y/BF/N go towards me, I stand up and hug her. 

“I was worried, why didn’t you said that you have a high fever?” She pulled her self out from the hug and look at me with worried eyes. 

“I just want to hang out with you today, we haven’t much done together.”. 

“Oh shut up, we could’ve just stay at your home and watch the live version” she said. 

“Do you want to go home? I mean, you need to go home so you could rest.” She added up, and she added again.

“We could just watch the live while driving you home, and when it’s done, we could watch more of your husband’s video, right, Harry?” She said sarcastically, looking serious at Harry.

Harry was shocked when he heard that. He didn’t know he was the one who’s talking about. 

“You have a husband?” He asked. 

“Of course not,Y/BF/N was just messing aro-” I got cut off when Y/BF/N said 

“Her husband’s name is Harry Edward Styles, she said it to herself when we driving here”. Maybe I looking like a tomato now, I hid my face on Y/BF/N’s shoulders and couldn’t help but smile. Still getting dizzy, Y/BF/N said 

“But before that, Harry, can we a take a picture??”. Harry smiled 

“Sure”. I take out my phone and take a picture of them. 

“Okay, Y/N go to your husband, now” Y/BF/N requested. Later, Y/BF/N. I go to the side of Harry and when Y/BF/N was about to pressed the button, Harry suddenly kissed my cheeks. OMAYGASHHHH!,WIIIEEEE!.

I thought this day was going to be a downhill since we didn’t get VIP tickets, we couldn’t afford it. Because we are contented to see Harry in front.

My eyes got widened, and the picture was taken. Y/BF/N look shocked too, but she only just smirked at me. I look at him with my widening eyes. 

“What? I couldn’t kiss my wife’s cheek. It should’ve been on the lips, ya know?”. I’m getting dizzy, not only from my sick right now, but also from what was happening.

It was time to go and I really need to rest. So I kissed Harry’s cheek too and ran to Y/BF/N, dragged her to the door and I said

“Bye, Harry”.

We are now getting out but I saw Niall.

“Y/BF/N want to lick your abs” at first, I thought that Niall’s not gonna think that it was for him but Y/BF/N got embarrassed when we got a response saying 

“Only if I have”. I just laughed and dragged Y/BF/N out if this place

**********

Still cannot move one from what just happened, My best friend can’t stop screaming and refreshing the memory over and over again. She just tweeted the picture too and she mentioned Harry, of course. She was waiting for a response but nothing, of course.

So while I was just gonna bring snack, I jump out when Y/BF/N screaming my name. I quickly grab the snacks and head to my bedroom. 

“What?” I ask. She look at with gleaming eyes 

“He responded, ask for your Twitter name, I just gave it right now” I heard a ding from my phone, we look at each other, as if we know the cue. I suddenly grab my phone form my desk and go to my bed with Y/BF/N. 

’Hey! So I saw your friend tweet and I ask for your Twitter name. I couldn’t get your twitter name since you get out quickly and I was wondering if you could meet up with me’ 

I look at Y/BF/N and her eyes is widening as I am and I look again at a another message 

’Were on a break before we are back to business. So I thought maybe I could spend my time with you. If you’re okay with it’. So I reply 

                                                                                    ’Of course, where to meet?’

He message me the place and asked for my number. Of course, I gave him my number. And after that, we say goodnight to him, same thing he did to me. And I was doing my happy dance on my bed…


“”“”“”“”“”“”“”“”“”“”“”“”
So that’s it, that’s my first imagine, first post here in tumblr. Hope you like, it’s pretty long. I have many more ideas. So that’s it’s bye -Bell 💓
“”“”“”“”“”“”“”“”“”“”“”“”

I opened my eyes and the first thing I saw, is a silhouette of a man looking at me. At first I didn’t see it, but when my eyes adjusted from the light, I saw Harry’s face staring at me. My face heat up, still embarrassed from the incident. I look from him and just stare in front of me. Still, my eyes widening, I remembered that I’m with Y/BF/N so I quickly get up and said 

“I’m fine now, I can go. My best friend’s waiting for me, thanks for the help. By-” I quickly feel a hand grab my wrist and drag me back to the couch with him. He sat and put my between his arm. My face was close to his so I stared infront of me, again. 

“Don’t worry, your best friend will go here, she’s allowed to. You rest before she got here, ‘kay?” I just nodded, enjoying that I’m between in his arms but not showing it. 

“I’m sorry when I mocked you, I don’t know how are you feeling then” he apologized. 

“No, it’s okay. Don’t apologize, I should be the one who should be apologizing now. I’m sorry for the “bathroom” incident a while a ago. I didn’t really realized that I was on male’s bathroom” I apologized back. 

“It’s okay,babe. Maybe we should just start over again, what’s your name?” He turn to me, making me turn to him too and said 

“Y/N”. 

“What a unique name” he complemented. My face heat up, I can’t register what’s going on. I heard a running footsteps towards the room and the door quickly opened. Y/BF/N go towards me, I stand up and hug her. 

“I was worried, why didn’t you said that you have a high fever?” She pulled her self out from the hug and look at me with worried eyes. 

“I just want to hang out with you today, we haven’t much done together.”. 

“Oh shut up, we could’ve just stay at your home and watch the live version” she said. 

“Do you want to go home? I mean, you need to go home so you could rest.” She added up, and she added again.

“We could just watch the live while driving you home, and when it’s done, we could watch more of your husband’s video, right, Harry?” She said sarcastically, looking serious at Harry.

Harry was shocked when he heard that. He didn’t know he was the one who’s talking about. 

“You have a husband?” He asked. 

“Of course not,Y/BF/N was just messing aro-” I got cut off when Y/BF/N said 

“Her husband’s name is Harry Edward Styles, she said it to herself when we driving here”. Maybe I looking like a tomato now, I hid my face on Y/BF/N’s shoulders and couldn’t help but smile. Still getting dizzy, Y/BF/N said 

“But before that, Harry, can we a take a picture??”. Harry smiled 

“Sure”. I take out my phone and take a picture of them. 

“Okay, Y/N go to your husband, now” Y/BF/N requested. Later, Y/BF/N. I go to the side of Harry and when Y/BF/N was about to pressed the button, Harry suddenly kissed my cheeks. OMAYGASHHHH!,WIIIEEEE!.

I thought this day was going to be a downhill since we didn’t get VIP tickets, we couldn’t afford it. Because we are contented to see Harry in front.

My eyes got widened, and the picture was taken. Y/BF/N look shocked too, but she only just smirked at me. I look at him with my widening eyes. 

“What? I couldn’t kiss my wife’s cheek. It should’ve been on the lips, ya know?”. I’m getting dizzy, not only from my sick right now, but also from what was happening.

It was time to go and I really need to rest. So I kissed Harry’s cheek too and ran to Y/BF/N, dragged her to the door and I said

“Bye, Harry”.

We are now getting out but I saw Niall.

“Y/BF/N want to lick your abs” at first, I thought that Niall’s not gonna think that it was for him but Y/BF/N got embarrassed when we got a response saying 

“Only if I have”. I just laughed and dragged Y/BF/N out if this place

**********

Still cannot move one from what just happened, My best friend can’t stop screaming and refreshing the memory over and over again. She just tweeted the picture too and she mentioned Harry, of course. She was waiting for a response but nothing, of course.

So while I was just gonna bring snack, I jump out when Y/BF/N screaming my name. I quickly grab the snacks and head to my bedroom. 

“What?” I ask. She look at with gleaming eyes 

“He responded, ask for your Twitter name, I just gave it right now” I heard a ding from my phone, we look at each other, as if we know the cue. I suddenly grab my phone form my desk and go to my bed with Y/BF/N. 

’Hey! So I saw your friend tweet and I ask for your Twitter name. I couldn’t get your twitter name since you get out quickly and I was wondering if you could meet up with me’ 

I look at Y/BF/N and her eyes is widening as I am and I look again at a another message 

’Were on a break before we are back to business. So I thought maybe I could spend my time with you. If you’re okay with it’. So I reply 

                                                                                    ’Of course, where to meet?’

He message me the place and asked for my number. Of course, I gave him my number. And after that, we say goodnight to him, same thing he did to me. And I was doing my happy dance on my bed…


“”“”“”“”“”“”“”“”“”“”“”“”
So that’s it, that’s my first imagine, first post here in tumblr. Hope you like, it’s pretty long. I have many more ideas. So that’s it’s bye -Bell 💓
“”“”“”“”“”“”“”“”“”“”“”“”

trail.content_raw:
So I’m meeting Harry Styles for that first time. I’m so excited, and I’ll be more excited if I didn’t feel like shit, waking up. When I woke up, my head’s pounding,nose is a little bit droopy, and my throat hurts. And I really wanted to meet Harry and this is my chance. I’m not letting that slipped. So I just go with it and took some medicine.

[[MORE]]

I go to the shower and of course, showered, what else am I going to do there. After like 30 minutes later, I go to my bedroom and wear a white T-shirt, that is a little big for me, a flannel that’s tied to my waist, but I’m gonna wear it, don’t worry. And skinny jeans, and black vans. I know my fashion sense is weird but I don’t really care.

My best friend, Y/BF/N, texted me saying that she’s in front of my house waiting for me. She has a car, so we decided that we go together since she’s going to his concert too.

“Are you excited??!!” She asked when she saw me, getting out of my house. When I got in front of her, I was giving my ‘Really??? You’re going to ask when you literally know the answer’s’ look. And she knows that look. I get really moody when I’m sick but that’s not an excuse for me to do that. But I can’t help it.

“Of course, I’m excited. I got to see my husband” I exclaimed. I’m a hazza since One Direction made. She’s a nialler but she really like the type of music Harry’s making. A indie,rock,19’s,David Bowie type of music. But don’t get me wrong, we love Niall’s type of music too, that makes you dirty dancing.We got to the car and drive to our destination.

* An hour and few minutes leyter…

We are now in the concert’s place and we are shocked when get there. There’s no people waiting in long line,maybe we got here a little early. 

“Hey, I’m just gonna buy some things in the store. Save some spot for me, please??” She smiled at me and said 

“Of course, but are you okay?? You look paler than you actually used too” worrily. I just nodded and gave her a reassuring smile, not trusting my voice because my throat really hurts like hell. She smiled back at me, believing that I was okay. I actually can go with that. 

“But please make it faster. I don’t like talking to other people by myself” I smiled at her and nodded and walk towards the pharmacy.

So there’s no really much people here. So I bought the same pills that I had back at home and look at the description.

*But wait for another four hours before you took another pill again. If the symptoms persist, please consult your doctor…..

Shit. My head really hurts like shit. And I’m gonna wait for four hours. Fuck no. But I just go with it since there’s nothing really I can do about it and grab a large water bottle. I go to the counter and the workers there did their job.

So when I get outside, there’s a really long line. And I see the person who’s gonna check out ticket and I ran there as fast as I can.

Luckily, I caught up and we’re the first ones who got inside. 

“Y/BF/N, you go there to our assigned seats, I’m gonna follow later” I’m getting really dizzy and I also need to pee because I really drink so many water before we go here. 

“Hey, you alright?? I don’t want to be annoying, but you really look like shit” she asked me worrily. “I’m fine, now go. Meet you later” I didn’t wait for her respond and find the restroom

So I quickly found the restroom, not looking at the signs, I go inside, and didn’t even noticed the toilet bolted on the walls and other differences of a male’s bathroom and female’s bathroom. I got to the stalls and pee, after I got out, I got really dizzy, and before I knew it, I was puking my guts out.

I flushed the toilet (don’t worry, I flushed the toilet after I peed), and get out and checked myself in the mirror. I grab my water and and drank it, not really swallowing it. I spit it so I can’t taste the vomit in my mouth. When I put my head up, I’m starting to realize that this is actually not the female’s restroom. I quickly put my stuff on the bag, wanting to get out of this place before I get seen by someone. But I’m very unlucky on this day.

I bumped into someone, not wanting to look at the face. But I need to, and start to apologizing. But when my head jerked up, It wasn’t any man, but the one and only, HARRY STYLES IS IN FRONT OF ME!!!. I cannot get more dizzy when I hit my head into this man’s chest, but just any man’s, it was Harry’s. My eyes got widened, really wanting to apologize but I can’t because my throat hurts and the only thing I really wanted to do, is run. So I ran out of the bathroom, before he memorized my face and reported it to the guards.

I breathe heavily as I get into front rows, realizing that this is gonna be awkward since Harry is going to be literally in front of me, performing. This couldn’t get any worse.

So longer than a few minutes later, the concert started and Harry jump into the scene and start performing. Luckily, he didn’t see me there in front of him, he was on the other side. I’m thinking he’s looking for someone, here in the concert…

* Couple hours leyter

It’s only just two hours after I took the pills, realizing that the pill didn’t work, but I also didn’t really want to drink the pills, not wanting to know what the side effects are ( ;) ). I just drank a plenty of water. After I did that, I’m shocked when I saw that Harry’s looking at me, smiling. Like I said, I’m really moody when I’m sick so I can’t smile, I don’t want to force it. So I just stand there, quietly, not doing anything, but enjoying the music that was getting performed.

A few minutes later, they’re still performing, don’t worry, they get a break before they started to perform. And while in the middle of performing, I saw Harry mocking me, standing like me while singing, of course. And looking at me, probably, when I don’t feel like shit, I just a laugh and get embarrassed. But my head’s really pounding, adding the vibration of the speakers. My eye rolled at the back of my head and before I knew it. I blacked out.

Harry’s POV

So I saw the girl from the bathroom and decided to mock her a little. I was getting a little annoyed ( just to be clear though, Harry’s not like this. I just did this for a little bit of….I don’t know. Just deal with it) because she just stands there, just being quiet. So when she saw me, I copied the same way she was standing and look at her, but I keep singing, don’t worry. But when I saw her eyes rolled back, I kinda felt regret and sad because I thought she was mad at me. But when she fell and luckily, her best friend was fast, yes, I can tell they were best friend, caught her.

I suddenly go to the guard and told them to get the girl who just faint brought it to room where I get ready call the emergency nurse. We came prepared always at this kind of case, but the only difference is I want to meet her and apologize so she’s going to be on my room. I get back from performing, the audience was kind of confused at first, but when I get back from performing, they just continue to sing with me.

So after the performance, I call that a break. So I quickly go to the room and see her, lying on the couch, with the nurse beside her, putting a wet, cold yiwer on her forehead. The nurse were completely aware I was there and turn around. 

“So, she’s okay now, she just got a high fever, so she need to take this pills every four hours. And drink plenty of water.”. I thanked the nurse and get out of here.

I go beside the girl, and I’m gonna be honest, she’s kinda.. pretty. Evey girl is pretty in their own ways, but I just can’t help but get captured by her looks. Not completely aware, she’s now waking up.

Y/N POV

Where am I?? Why am I on the couch?. I just feel that I’m lying on the couch but I can still feel the vibrations of the sound and the music was playing. I opened my eyes and the first thing I saw, is a silhouette of a man looking at me. At first I didn’t see it, but when my eyes adjusted from the light, I saw Harry’s face staring at me. My face heat up, still embarrassed from the incident. I look from him and just stare in front of me. Still, my eyes widening, I remembered that I’m with Y/BF/N so I quickly get up and said 

“I’m fine now, I can go. My best friend’s waiting for me, thanks for the help. By-” I quickly feel a hand grab my wrist and drag me back to the couch with him. He sat and put my between his arm. My face was close to his so I stared infront of me, again. 

“Don’t worry, your best friend will go here, she’s allowed to. You rest before she got here, ‘kay?” I just nodded, enjoying that I’m between in his arms but not showing it. 

“I’m sorry when I mocked you, I don’t know how are you feeling then” he apologized. 

“No, it’s okay. Don’t apologize, I should be the one who should be apologizing now. I’m sorry for the “bathroom” incident a while a ago. I didn’t really realized that I was on male’s bathroom” I apologized back. 

“It’s okay,babe. Maybe we should just start over again, what’s your name?” He turn to me, making me turn to him too and said 

“Y/N”. 

“What a unique name” he complemented. My face heat up, I can’t register what’s going on. I heard a running footsteps towards the room and the door quickly opened. Y/BF/N go towards me, I stand up and hug her. 

“I was worried, why didn’t you said that you have a high fever?” She pulled her self out from the hug and look at me with worried eyes. 

“I just want to hang out with you today, we haven’t much done together.”. 

“Oh shut up, we could’ve just stay at your home and watch the live version” she said. 

“Do you want to go home? I mean, you need to go home so you could rest.” She added up, and she added again.

“We could just watch the live while driving you home, and when it’s done, we could watch more of your husband’s video, right, Harry?” She said sarcastically, looking serious at Harry.

Harry was shocked when he heard that. He didn’t know he was the one who’s talking about. 

“You have a husband?” He asked. 

“Of course not,Y/BF/N was just messing aro-” I got cut off when Y/BF/N said 

“Her husband’s name is Harry Edward Styles, she said it to herself when we driving here”. Maybe I looking like a tomato now, I hid my face on Y/BF/N’s shoulders and couldn’t help but smile. Still getting dizzy, Y/BF/N said 

“But before that, Harry, can we a take a picture??”. Harry smiled 

“Sure”. I take out my phone and take a picture of them. 

“Okay, Y/N go to your husband, now” Y/BF/N requested. Later, Y/BF/N. I go to the side of Harry and when Y/BF/N was about to pressed the button, Harry suddenly kissed my cheeks. OMAYGASHHHH!,WIIIEEEE!.

I thought this day was going to be a downhill since we didn’t get VIP tickets, we couldn’t afford it. Because we are contented to see Harry in front.

My eyes got widened, and the picture was taken. Y/BF/N look shocked too, but she only just smirked at me. I look at him with my widening eyes. 

“What? I couldn’t kiss my wife’s cheek. It should’ve been on the lips, ya know?”. I’m getting dizzy, not only from my sick right now, but also from what was happening.

It was time to go and I really need to rest. So I kissed Harry’s cheek too and ran to Y/BF/N, dragged her to the door and I said

“Bye, Harry”.

We are now getting out but I saw Niall.

“Y/BF/N want to lick your abs” at first, I thought that Niall’s not gonna think that it was for him but Y/BF/N got embarrassed when we got a response saying 

“Only if I have”. I just laughed and dragged Y/BF/N out if this place

**********

Still cannot move one from what just happened, My best friend can’t stop screaming and refreshing the memory over and over again. She just tweeted the picture too and she mentioned Harry, of course. She was waiting for a response but nothing, of course.

So while I was just gonna bring snack, I jump out when Y/BF/N screaming my name. I quickly grab the snacks and head to my bedroom. 

“What?” I ask. She look at with gleaming eyes 

“He responded, ask for your Twitter name, I just gave it right now” I heard a ding from my phone, we look at each other, as if we know the cue. I suddenly grab my phone form my desk and go to my bed with Y/BF/N. 

’Hey! So I saw your friend tweet and I ask for your Twitter name. I couldn’t get your twitter name since you get out quickly and I was wondering if you could meet up with me’ 

I look at Y/BF/N and her eyes is widening as I am and I look again at a another message 

’Were on a break before we are back to business. So I thought maybe I could spend my time with you. If you’re okay with it’. So I reply 

                                                                                    ’Of course, where to meet?’

He message me the place and asked for my number. Of course, I gave him my number. And after that, we say goodnight to him, same thing he did to me. And I was doing my happy dance on my bed…


“”“”“”“”“”“”“”“”“”“”“”“”
So that’s it, that’s my first imagine, first post here in tumblr. Hope you like, it’s pretty long. I have many more ideas. So that’s it’s bye -Bell 💓

“Of course not,Y/BF/N was just messing aro-” I got cut off when Y/BF/N said 

“Her husband’s name is Harry Edward Styles, she said it to herself when we driving here”. Maybe I looking like a tomato now, I hid my face on Y/BF/N’s shoulders and couldn’t help but smile. Still getting dizzy, Y/BF/N said 

“But before that, Harry, can we a take a picture??”. Harry smiled 

“Sure”. I take out my phone and take a picture of them. 

“Okay, Y/N go to your husband, now” Y/BF/N requested. Later, Y/BF/N. I go to the side of Harry and when Y/BF/N was about to pressed the button, Harry suddenly kissed my cheeks. OMAYGASHHHH!,WIIIEEEE!.

I thought this day was going to be a downhill since we didn’t get VIP tickets, we couldn’t afford it. Because we are contented to see Harry in front.

My eyes got widened, and the picture was taken. Y/BF/N look shocked too, but she only just smirked at me. I look at him with my widening eyes. 

“What? I couldn’t kiss my wife’s cheek. It should’ve been on the lips, ya know?”. I’m getting dizzy, not only from my sick right now, but also from what was happening.

It was time to go and I really need to rest. So I kissed Harry’s cheek too and ran to Y/BF/N, dragged her to the door and I said

“Bye, Harry”.

We are now getting out but I saw Niall.

“Y/BF/N want to lick your abs” at first, I thought that Niall’s not gonna think that it was for him but Y/BF/N got embarrassed when we got a response saying 

“Only if I have”. I just laughed and dragged Y/BF/N out if this place

**********

Still cannot move one from what just happened, My best friend can’t stop screaming and refreshing the memory over and over again. She just tweeted the picture too and she mentioned Harry, of course. She was waiting for a response but nothing, of course.

So while I was just gonna bring snack, I jump out when Y/BF/N screaming my name. I quickly grab the snacks and head to my bedroom. 

“What?” I ask. She look at with gleaming eyes 

“He responded, ask for your Twitter name, I just gave it right now” I heard a ding from my phone, we look at each other, as if we know the cue. I suddenly grab my phone form my desk and go to my bed with Y/BF/N. 

’Hey! So I saw your friend tweet and I ask for your Twitter name. I couldn’t get your twitter name since you get out quickly and I was wondering if you could meet up with me’ 

I look at Y/BF/N and her eyes is widening as I am and I look again at a another message 

’Were on a break before we are back to business. So I thought maybe I could spend my time with you. If you’re okay with it’. So I reply 

                                                                                    ’Of course, where to meet?’

He message me the place and asked for my number. Of course, I gave him my number. And after that, we say goodnight to him, same thing he did to me. And I was doing my happy dance on my bed…


“”“”“”“”“”“”“”“”“”“”“”“”
So that’s it, that’s my first imagine, first post here in tumblr. Hope you like, it’s pretty long. I have many more ideas. So that’s it’s bye -Bell 💓
“”“”“”“”“”“”“”“”“”“”“”“”
trail.content_abstract: So I’m meeting Harry Styles for that first time. I’m so excited, and I’ll be more excited if I didn’t feel like shit, waking up. When I woke up, my head’s pounding,nose is a little bit droopy, and my throat hurts. And I really wanted to meet Harry and this is my chance. I’m not letting that slipped. So I just go with it and took some medicine.

title: Operation: Potential Breakup
body:
Breaking up is hard to do, especially when it’s not even your relationship!

Chapter 07

Once Abigail reached the grand doors of the Great Hall, she sucked in a quick breath, shutting her eyes and shaking her head slowly. She had gotten Harry to remember her, but at what cost? He didn’t…

Read more…

blog.title: lavender menace
blog.description:
penelope - bi - retired horse girl

harry styles is a bad bitch you can’t kill him

always here to talk, wuv u! <3

body:
she’s risen from the dead

HI it’s kay, y’all probably don’t remember me! so let me reintroduce myself!

i’m actually 3 days old so… i use twitter slang way too much. and use emojis ironically cause i’m relatable and have really original ideas 🤪🤪🤠!! i’m currently in school and it is kicking my ass. i s2g i’ve never been so broken out. but my social life is good! i have a lot of friends and i’ve made peace with everyone. i’m bi as heck, i came out not too long ago, very scary but i have a great support system. i struggle w/ mental illness but i kick it’s ass every single day i get out of bed! single as a pringle, for awhile. liked a manz and it didn’t turn out great. i’ve had tumblr off and on for a good 4 years. i love harry obviously, 5sos a lot more i can’t think of. it’s nice to meet y’all! hope your day is going well and i hope you’re doing okay! uwu
